altername_name: ゼノブレイド３　新たなる未来
name: xenoblade chronicles 3: future redeemed
overview: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: Future Redeemed (Japanese: ゼノブレイド３　新たなる未来, Zenobureido 3 Aratanaru mirai) is an expansion to Xenoblade Chronicles 3 published by Nintendo and developed by Monolith Soft for the Nintendo Switch. Xenoblade Chronicles 3: Future Redeemed is a direct prequel to Xenoblade Chronicles 3, with a story that connects all three installments of the Xenoblade Chronicles trilogy.
